843770.name: Invasion: Episode 1 OST
843770.description:
Hi all!
Darkman007 reworked and improved the original Invasion tracks.
So, in loseless FLAC format it all sounds much more cool and tasty.
I love this new album, it is powerful like a nuke and groovy like a pure dopamine.

*** Tracklist ( all music in high-quality loseless FLAC format ) ***

01 - Sneaky Bastards - 1:33
02 - Take Your Tank, Soldier - 4:01
03 - Kill 'Em All! - 3:01
04 - ..And Be Happy - 3:39
05 - Next Wave - 4:03
06 - Heroic Weekdays - 2:47
07 - It's Time to Save The World - 3:08
08 - Something Really Serious - 1:45
09 - Kick Out The Big Ass - 3:03
10 - Victory! - 3:20
11 - Something Went Wrong - 3:15
12 - Prepare for The Real Battle! - 1:22

Just check out this progressive metal-electronic-synth mix!

wbr, brutalsoft
